agenda_items.name: 121316-HA-Mins Apprvl 4 10/11/16
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday, October 11, 2016.

agenda_items.name: 121316-HA-R&F; R&O; Perf Rpt 4 August 16'
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Report for August 2016.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: 121316-HA-R&F; R&O; Perf Rpt 4 September 16'
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Report for September 2016.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: 121316-HA-Assessment of Fair Housing
agenda_items.title: Recommendation to approve Cityâ€™s Assessment of Fair Housing for the period of October 1, 2017 through September 30, 2022 and authorize City Manager, or designee, to take actions to further the goals identified in the Assessment of Fair Housing.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: 121316-HA-Project-Based Vouchers
agenda_items.title:
Recommendation to authorize Executive Director, or designee, to release a Request for Proposals (RFP) advertising the availability of Project-Based Vouchers (PBV) and solicit participation in the program from interested property owners of affordable units; and

Authorize Executive Director, or designee, to negotiate and execute agreement(s) to enter into Housing Assistance Payment contract(s) for PBV assistance in accordance with Housing and Urban Development (HUD) guidelines for qualified proposals submitted in response to this RFP and also approved by HUD.  (Citywide)

agenda_items.name: 121316-HA-RES Housing Choice Voucher Program
agenda_items.title:
WITHDRAWN
Recommendation to adopt resolution of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California, approving a revised voucher Payment Standard Schedule for the Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher Program, effective December 14, 2016, for all zip code areas in Long Beach.  (Citywide)
